adDetails: Hello My name is Oscar Lazcano, I have been working as a Handyman for more than ten years,working around different areas,Berkeley, Oakland,Albany, El Cerrito, Hercules. I do electrical jobs as well,inside or outside your home. Contact for free estimate at show contact info Thank you
